TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Financial extends System.Object

summary.span: 模組包含用來執行帳務處理運算的程序。

span.span: The module contains procedures used to perform financial operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個模組支援的 Visual Basic 執行階段程式庫成員來執行例如折舊、 現在與未來的值、 利率、 率傳回時和付款的財務計算。This module supports the Visual Basic run-time library members that perform financial calculations such as depreciation, present and future values, interest rates, rates of return, and payments. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Rate`函數來計算的貸款利率提供付款的總數 (`TotPmts`)，loan 付款金額 (`Payment`)，現值或主體的貸款 (`PVal`)，未來貸款的值 (`FVal`)，表示是否付款已到期的開頭或結尾的付款期間的數字 (`PayType`)，和預期的利率的近似值 (`Guess`)。This example uses the `Rate` function to calculate the interest rate of a loan, given the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the amount of the loan payment (`Payment`), the present value or principal of the loan (`PVal`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`), and an approximation of the expected interest rate (`Guess`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

span.span: Financial Summary
Keywords (Visual Basic)

related.span: Visual Basic 執行階段程式庫成員

span.span: Visual Basic Run-Time Library Members

MemberSignature.Value: public static double DDB (double Cost, double Salvage, double Life, double Period, double Factor = 2);
.method public static float64 DDB(float64 Cost, float64 Salvage, float64 Life, float64 Period, float64 Factor) cil managed
Public Function DDB (Cost As Double, Salvage As Double, Life As Double, Period As Double, Optional Factor As Double = 2) As Double
static member DDB : double * double * double * double * double -> double

param.name: Cost
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產的初始成本。

span.span: specifying initial cost of the asset.

param.name: Salvage
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產在可用期末的價值。

span.span: specifying value of the asset at the end of its useful life.

param.name: Life
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產的可用期間長度。

span.span: specifying length of useful life of the asset.

param.name: Period
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定計算資產折舊所用的期間。

span.span: specifying period for which asset depreciation is calculated.

param.name: Factor
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: ，指定餘額遞減所用的利率。

span.span: specifying rate at which the balance declines.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設是 2 (雙倍遞減法)。

span.span: If omitted, 2 (double-declining method) is assumed.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定在使用雙倍餘額遞減法或您指定的某個其他方法時，資產在特定期間內的折舊。

span.span: Returns a specifying the depreciation of an asset for a specific time period using the double-declining balance method or some other method you specify.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定在使用雙倍餘額遞減法或您指定的某個其他方法時，資產在特定期間內的折舊。

span.span: Returns a specifying the depreciation of an asset for a specific time period using the double-declining balance method or some other method you specify.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雙精度浮點數餘額遞減倍率遞減法計算以加速速率的折舊。The double-declining balance method computes depreciation at an accelerated rate. 折舊的第一個週期中最高，並減少在後續的期間。Depreciation is highest in the first period and decreases in successive periods. `Life`和`Period`引數必須以相同的單位表示。The `Life` and `Period` arguments must be expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Life`有幾個月，`Period`也必須指定幾個月。For example, if `Life` is given in months, `Period` must also be given in months. 所有引數必須是正數。All arguments must be positive numbers. `DDB`函式會使用下列公式來計算給定的期間內的折舊：The `DDB` function uses the following formula to calculate depreciation for a given period: 折舊期間 = / ((Cost – Salvage) \* 因素) / 生命Depreciation / Period = ((Cost – Salvage) \* Factor) / Life ## Examples 這個範例會使用`DDB`函數來傳回計算資產折舊的初始成本在指定期間內 (`InitCost`)，殘餘價值的資產使用年限的結尾 (`SalvageVal`)，總計的生命週期的年份 (中的資產`LifeTime`)，與計算的折舊的年度期間 (`Depr`)。This example uses the `DDB` function to return the depreciation of an asset for a specified period given the initial cost (`InitCost`), the salvage value at the end of the asset's useful life (`SalvageVal`), the total life of the asset in years (`LifeTime`), and the period in years for which the depreciation is calculated (`Depr`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static double FV (double Rate, double NPer, double Pmt, double PV = 0, Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod);

Public Function FV (Rate As Double, NPer As Double, Pmt As Double, Optional PV As Double = 0, Optional Due As DueDate = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod) As Double
static member FV : double * double * double * double * Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate -> double

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定每期利率。

span.span: specifying interest rate per period.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽車貸款年利率 (APR) 為 10% 並採月付方式償還，則每期的利率為 0.1/12，也就是 0.0083。

span.span: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.

param.name: NPer
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定年金的總付款期數。

span.span: specifying total number of payment periods in the annuity.

param.span: 例如，如果您的四年期汽車貸款是採月付方式償還，則付款總期數就是 4 x 12 (即 48) 期。

span.span: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 x 12 (or 48) payment periods.

param.name: Pmt
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定每一期所要付的款項。

span.span: specifying payment to be made each period.

param.span: 款項通常包含本金，以及不會隨著年金的有效期間而變更的利息。

span.span: Payments usually contain principal and interest that doesn't change over the life of the annuity.

param.name: PV
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 選擇項。，指定一系列未來付款的現值 (或整筆金額)。

span.span: specifying present value (or lump sum) of a series of future payments.

param.span: 例如，當您貸款買車時，貸款金額就是您要以每月支付方式付給貸方的車款金額現值。

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 類型的物件，指定付款何時到期。

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 這個引數必須是 (若付款期限是付款期間的結束日)，或 (若付款期限是付款期間的開始日)。

span.span: This argument must be either if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 。

span.span: If omitted, is assumed.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金未來值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the future value of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金未來值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the future value of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 計算的年金是一系列固定的現金付款經過一段時間。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over time. 計算的年金不一定 （例如房屋貸款） 貸款投資 （例如每月的節省方案）。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). `Rate`和`NPer`引數必須使用相同的單位表示一期付款期間計算。The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Rate`會使用幾個月，計算`NPer`必須也計算使用幾個月。For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months. 負數的數字; 對於所有的引數，表示現金支付方式 （例如存款）現金收入 （例如被除數檢查） 被以正數。For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`FV`函數來傳回給定百分比所計算的年金未來值比率，每個期間都會累算 (`APR / 12`)，付款的總數 (`TotPmts`)，付款 (`Payment`)，目前的值投資 (`PVal`)，並指出是否會扣款的開頭或結尾的付款期間的數字 (`PayType`)。This example uses the `FV` function to return the future value of an investment given the percentage rate that accrues per period (`APR / 12`), the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the payment (`Payment`), the current value of the investment (`PVal`), and a number that indicates whether the payment is made at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`). 請注意，因為`Payment`代表現金支出，它是負數。Note that because `Payment` represents cash paid out, it is a negative number. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#22)]

span.span: Financial Summary

MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.VisualBasic.Financial.IPmt (Rate, Per, NPer, PV, FV, Due)

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定每期利率。

span.span: specifying interest rate per period.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽車貸款年利率 (APR) 為 10% 並採月付方式償還，則每期的利率為 0.1/12，也就是 0.0083。

span.span: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.

param.name: Per
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 可指定在 1 到 範圍內的付款期間。

span.span: specifying payment period in the range 1 through .

param.name: NPer
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定年金的總付款期數。

span.span: specifying total number of payment periods in the annuity.

param.span: 例如，如果您的四年期汽車貸款是採月付方式償還，則付款總期數就是 4 x 12 (即 48) 期。

span.span: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 x 12 (or 48) payment periods.

param.name: PV
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定一系列的未來付款或收到款項的現值或今天的價值。

span.span: specifying present value, or value today, of a series of future payments or receipts.

param.span: 例如，當您貸款買車時，貸款金額就是您要以每月支付方式付給貸方的車款金額現值。

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

param.name: FV
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: ，指定您在最後一次付款之後想要的未來值或現金結存。

span.span: specifying future value or cash balance you want after you've made the final payment.

param.span: 例如，貸款的未來值為 $0，因為那是它在最後一期付款之後的值。

span.span: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that's its value after the final payment.

param.span: 然而，如果您想在 18 年內存下美金 $50,000 元做為子女教育費用，那麼美金 $50,000 元就是未來值。

span.span: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 類型的物件，指定付款何時到期。

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 這個引數必須是 DueDate.EndOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的結束日)，或 DueDate.BegOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的開始日)。

span.span: This argument must be either DueDate.EndOfPeriod if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or DueDate.BegOfPeriod if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 DueDate.EndOfPeriod。

span.span: If omitted, DueDate.EndOfPeriod is assumed.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金在給定之期間內的利息付款。

span.span: Returns a specifying the interest payment for a given period of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金在給定之期間內的利息付款。

span.span: Returns a specifying the interest payment for a given period of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 計算的年金是一系列固定的現金付款經過一段時間。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over time. 計算的年金不一定 （例如房屋貸款） 貸款投資 （例如每月的節省方案）。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). `Rate`和`NPer`引數必須使用相同的單位表示一期付款期間計算。The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Rate`會使用幾個月，計算`NPer`必須也計算使用幾個月。For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months. 負數的數字; 對於所有的引數，表示現金支付方式 （例如存款）現金收入 （例如被除數檢查） 被以正數。For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`IPmt`計算相等值的所有付款時多少付款是感興趣的函式。This example uses the `IPmt` function to calculate how much of a payment is interest when all the payments are of equal value. 是每一期百分比利率 (`APR / 12`)，想要與感興趣部分的付款期間 (`Period`)，付款的總數 (`TotPmts`)，現值或主體的貸款 (`PVal`)，貸款的未來值 (`FVal`)，並指出付款是否已到期的開頭或結尾的付款期間的數字 (`PayType`)。Given are the interest percentage rate per period (`APR / 12`), the payment period for which the interest portion is desired (`Period`), the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the present value or principal of the loan (`PVal`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), and a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#26)]

span.span: Financial Summary

MemberSignature.Value: public static double IRR (ref double[] ValueArray, double Guess = 0.1);
.method public static float64 IRR(float64[]& ValueArray, float64 Guess) cil managed
Public Function IRR (ByRef ValueArray As Double(), Optional Guess As Double = 0.1) As Double
static member IRR : * double -> double

param.name: ValueArray
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定現金流量值的 陣列；

span.span: Array of specifying cash flow values.

param.span: 這個陣列至少必須含有一項負值 (付款) 和一項正值 (收款)。

span.span: The array must contain at least one negative value (a payment) and one positive value (a receipt).

param.name: Guess
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 指定您預估值的物件將會由 所傳回。

span.span: Object specifying value you estimate will be returned by .

param.span: 如果省略，則 會是 0.1 (百分之 10)。

span.span: If omitted, is 0.1 (10 percent).

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定一系列的定期現金流量 (付款及收到的款項) 之實質報酬率。

span.span: Returns a specifying the internal rate of return for a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts).

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定一系列的定期現金流量 (付款及收到的款項) 之實質報酬率。

span.span: Returns a specifying the internal rate of return for a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內部報酬率是收到的款項及固定間隔發生的回條組成的投資的利率。The internal rate of return is the interest rate received for an investment consisting of payments and receipts that occur at regular intervals. `IRR`函式會使用解譯的付款和收款順序的值陣列中的順序。The `IRR` function uses the order of values within the array to interpret the order of payments and receipts. 請務必輸入您的付款和收款值正確的順序。Be sure to enter your payment and receipt values in the correct sequence. 因為它是計算的年金每段期間之現金流量不需要予以修正。The cash flow for each period does not need to be fixed, as it is for an annuity. `IRR` 計算方式為反覆項目。`IRR` is calculated by iteration. 值的起始`Guess`，`IRR`循環的計算，直到 0.00001%為止。Starting with the value of `Guess`, `IRR` cycles through the calculation until the result is accurate to within 0.00001 percent. 如果`IRR`找不到 20 之後的結果會嘗試，它將會失敗。If `IRR` cannot find a result after 20 tries, it fails. ## Examples 在此範例中，`IRR`函式會傳回一系列的五個陣列中包含的現金流量的內部報酬率`Values()`。In this example, the `IRR` function returns the internal rate of return for a series of five cash flows contained in the array `Values()`. 第一個陣列元素是負的現金流量，代表商務成本。The first array element is a negative cash flow representing business start-up costs. 其餘的四個現金流量代表後續的四年正數的現金流量。The remaining four cash flows represent positive cash flows for the subsequent four years. `Guess` 是預估的內部報酬率。`Guess` is the estimated internal rate of return. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#20)]

span.span: Array argument values are invalid or <= -1.
Financial Summary

param.span: 必要。

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定一系列的定期現金流量 (付款及收到的款項) 之修正的實質報酬率。

span.span: Returns a specifying the modified internal rate of return for a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已修改的內部報酬率時付款和收款融資不同費率的內部報酬率。The modified internal rate of return is the internal rate of return when payments and receipts are financed at different rates. `MIRR`函式會考慮投資成本 (`FinanceRate`) 和利率的現金上收到的利率 (`ReinvestRate`)。The `MIRR` function takes into account both the cost of the investment (`FinanceRate`) and the interest rate received on reinvestment of cash (`ReinvestRate`). `FinanceRate`和`ReinvestRatearguments`會表示為十進位值的百分比。The `FinanceRate` and `ReinvestRatearguments` are percentages expressed as decimal values. 例如，12 百分比會以 0.12。For example, 12 percent is expressed as 0.12. `MIRR`函式會使用解譯的付款和收款順序的值陣列中的順序。The `MIRR` function uses the order of values within the array to interpret the order of payments and receipts. 請務必輸入您的付款和收款值正確的順序。Be sure to enter your payment and receipt values in the correct sequence. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`MIRR`函數來傳回陣列中包含的現金流量的一系列的實質報酬率`Values()`。This example uses the `MIRR` function to return the modified internal rate of return for a series of cash flows contained in the array `Values()`. `LoanAPR` 代表融資感興趣，和`InvAPR`代表存款上收到的利率。`LoanAPR` represents the financing interest, and `InvAPR` represents the interest rate received on reinvestment. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#29](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#29)]

span.span: Rank of does not equal 1, = -1, or = -1
Division by zero has occurred.
Financial Summary

MemberSignature.Value: public static double NPer (double Rate, double Pmt, double PV, double FV = 0, Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod);
.method public static float64 NPer(float64 Rate, float64 Pmt, float64 PV, float64 FV, valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due) cil managed
Public Function NPer (Rate As Double, Pmt As Double, PV As Double, Optional FV As Double = 0, Optional Due As DueDate = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod) As Double
static member NPer : double * double * double * double * Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate -> double

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定每期利率。

span.span: specifying interest rate per period.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽車貸款年利率 (APR) 為 10% 並採月付方式償還，則每期的利率為 0.1/12，也就是 0.0083。

span.span: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.

param.name: Pmt
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定每一期所要付的款項。

span.span: specifying payment to be made each period.

param.span: 款項通常包含本金，以及不會隨著年金的有效期間而變更的利息。

span.span: Payments usually contain principal and interest that does not change over the life of the annuity.

param.name: PV
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定一系列的未來付款或收到款項的現值或今天的價值。

span.span: specifying present value, or value today, of a series of future payments or receipts.

param.span: 例如，當您貸款買車時，貸款金額就是您要以每月支付方式付給貸方的車款金額現值。

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

param.name: FV
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: ，指定您在最後一次付款之後想要的未來值或現金結存。

span.span: specifying future value or cash balance you want after you have made the final payment.

param.span: 例如，貸款的未來值為 $0，因為是代表最後一期付款之後的值。

span.span: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.

param.span: 然而，如果您想在 18 年內存下美金 $50,000 元做為子女教育費用，那麼美金 $50,000 元就是未來值。

span.span: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 類型的物件，指定付款何時到期。

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 這個引數必須是 DueDate.EndOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的結束日)，或 DueDate.BegOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的開始日)。

span.span: This argument must be either DueDate.EndOfPeriod if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or DueDate.BegOfPeriod if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 DueDate.EndOfPeriod。

span.span: If omitted, DueDate.EndOfPeriod is assumed.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金期數。

span.span: Returns a specifying the number of periods for an annuity based on periodic fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金期數。

span.span: Returns a specifying the number of periods for an annuity based on periodic fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 計算的年金是一系列固定的現金付款經過一段時間。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over a period of time. 計算的年金不一定 （例如房屋貸款） 貸款投資 （例如每月的節省方案）。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). 負數的數字; 對於所有的引數，表示現金支付方式 （例如存款）現金收入 （例如被除數檢查） 被以正數。For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`NPer`函數來傳回期間付款必須對其值償還貸款的期數包含在`PVal`。This example uses the `NPer` function to return the number of periods during which payments must be made to pay off a loan whose value is contained in `PVal`. 此外還提供一些每一期百分比利率 (`APR / 12`)，付款 (`Payment`)，貸款的未來值 (`FVal`)，並指出付款是否已到期的開頭或結尾的付款期間的數字 (`PayType`).Also provided are the interest percentage rate per period (`APR / 12`), the payment (`Payment`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), and a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#19)]

span.span: = 0 and = 0

MemberSignature.Value: public static double NPV (double Rate, ref double[] ValueArray);
.method public static float64 NPV(float64 Rate, float64[]& ValueArray) cil managed
Public Function NPV (Rate As Double, ByRef ValueArray As Double()) As Double
public: static double NPV(double Rate, cli::array <double> ^ % ValueArray);
static member NPV : double * -> double

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定某段期間的重貼現率，以十進位值表示。

span.span: specifying discount rate over the length of the period, expressed as a decimal.

param.name: ValueArray
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定現金流量值的 陣列；

span.span: Array of specifying cash flow values.

param.span: 這個陣列至少必須含有一項負值 (付款) 和一項正值 (收款)。

span.span: The array must contain at least one negative value (a payment) and one positive value (a receipt).

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定根據一系列的定期現金流量 (付款和收款) 及重貼現率所得的投資淨現值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the net present value of an investment based on a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts) and a discount rate.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定根據一系列的定期現金流量 (付款和收款) 及重貼現率所得的投資淨現值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the net present value of an investment based on a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts) and a discount rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的值，一系列未來付款和收款的投資淨現值。The net present value of an investment is the current value of a future series of payments and receipts. `NPV`函式會使用解譯的付款和收款順序的值陣列中的順序。The `NPV` function uses the order of values within the array to interpret the order of payments and receipts. 請務必輸入您的付款和收款值正確的順序。Be sure to enter your payment and receipt values in the correct sequence. `NPV`投資開始的第一個的現金流量值的前一期，並在陣列結尾的最後一個的現金流量值。The `NPV` investment begins one period before the date of the first cash flow value and ends with the last cash flow value in the array. 淨現值計算根據未來的現金流量。The net present value calculation is based on future cash flows. 如果您第一次的現金流量發生的第一個週期的開頭，必須新增的第一個值所傳回的值`NPV`不會包含的現金流量值`ValueArray`。If your first cash flow occurs at the beginning of the first period, the first value must be added to the value returned by `NPV` and must not be included in the cash flow values of `ValueArray`. `NPV`函數很相似`PV`函式 （目前的值），不同之處在於`PV`函式可讓現金流量開始在結束或句點開頭。The `NPV` function is similar to the `PV` function (present value) except that the `PV` function allows cash flows to begin either at the end or the beginning of a period. 不同於變數`NPV`現金流量值`PV`現金流量必須固定在整個投資。Unlike the variable `NPV` cash flow values, `PV` cash flows must be fixed throughout the investment. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`NPV`函數來傳回一系列的現金流量的陣列中所含的淨現值`values()`。This example uses the `NPV` function to return the net present value for a series of cash flows contained in the array `values()`. 傳回值，儲存在`FixedRetRate`，代表固定的內部報酬率。The return value, stored in `FixedRetRate`, represents the fixed internal rate of return. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

span.span: is , rank of <> 1, or = -1

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 可指定每期利率。

span.span: specifies the interest rate per period.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽車貸款年利率 (APR) 為 10% 並採月付方式償還，則每期的利率為 0.1/12，也就是 0.0083。

span.span: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.

param.name: NPer
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定年金保險投資中付款的總期數。

span.span: specifies the total number of payment periods in the annuity.

param.span: 例如，如果您的四年期汽車貸款是採月付方式償還，則付款總期數就是 4 x 12 (即 48) 期。

span.span: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 × 12 (or 48) payment periods.

param.name: PV
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 會指定未來要支付的一系列付款款項的現值 (或整筆金額)。

span.span: specifies the present value (or lump sum) that a series of payments to be paid in the future is worth now.

param.span: 例如，當您貸款買車時，貸款金額就是您要以每月支付方式付給貸方的車款金額現值。

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

param.name: FV
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: ，指定您在最後一次付款之後想要的未來值或現金結存。

span.span: specifying future value or cash balance you want after you have made the final payment.

param.span: 例如，貸款的未來值為 $0，因為是代表最後一期付款之後的值。

span.span: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.

param.span: 然而，如果您想在 18 年內存下美金 $50,000 元做為子女教育費用，那麼美金 $50,000 元就是未來值。

span.span: However, if you want to save $50,000 during 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 類型的物件，指定付款何時到期。

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 這個引數必須是 DueDate.EndOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的結束日)，或 DueDate.BegOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的開始日)。

span.span: This argument must be either DueDate.EndOfPeriod if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or DueDate.BegOfPeriod if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 DueDate.EndOfPeriod。

span.span: If omitted, DueDate.EndOfPeriod is assumed.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金付款款項。

span.span: Returns a specifying the payment for an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金付款款項。

span.span: Returns a specifying the payment for an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 計算的年金是時間的一系列固定的現金付款期間。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made during a period of time. 計算的年金不一定 （例如房屋貸款） 貸款投資 （例如每月的節省方案）。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). `Rate`和`NPer`引數必須使用相同的單位表示一期付款期間計算。The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Rate`會使用幾個月，計算`NPer`必須也計算使用幾個月。For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months. 現金支出 （例如存款） 表示負數; 所有的引數，現金收入 （例如被除數檢查） 被以正數。For all arguments, cash paid (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Pmt`函數來傳回在一段固定期間貸款的每月付款。This example uses the `Pmt` function to return the monthly payment for a loan during a fixed period. 是每一期百分比利率 (`APR / 12`)，付款的總數 (`TotPmts`)，現值或主體的貸款 (`PVal`)，貸款的未來值 (`FVal`)，和數字，指出是否付款已到期的開頭或結尾的付款期間 `(PayType).`Given are the interest percentage rate per period (`APR / 12`), the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the present value or principal of the loan (`PVal`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), and a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period `(PayType).` [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#7)]

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽車貸款年利率 (APR) 為 10% 並採月付方式償還，則每期的利率為 0.1/12，也就是 0.0083。

span.span: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.

param.name: Per
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 可指定在 1 到 範圍內的付款期間。

span.span: specifies the payment period in the range 1 through .

param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定年金保險投資中付款的總期數。

span.span: specifies the total number of payment periods in the annuity.

param.span: 例如，如果您的四年期汽車貸款是採月付方式償還，則付款總期數就是 4 x 12 (即 48) 期。

span.span: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 x 12 (or 48) payment periods.

param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 必要項。 可指定一系列的未來付款或收到款項的現值。

span.span: specifies the current value of a series of future payments or receipts.

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

span.span: Optional.

param.span: ，指定您在最後一次付款之後想要的未來值或現金結存。

param.span: 例如，貸款的未來值為 $0，因為是代表最後一期付款之後的值。

span.span: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.

param.span: 然而，如果您想在 18 年內存下美金 $50,000 元做為子女教育費用，那麼美金 $50,000 元就是未來值。

span.span: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金在給定之期間內的本金付款款項。

span.span: Returns a specifying the principal payment for a given period of an annuity based on periodic fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金在給定之期間內的本金付款款項。

span.span: Returns a specifying the principal payment for a given period of an annuity based on periodic fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 計算的年金是一系列固定的現金付款經過一段時間。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over a period of time. 計算的年金不一定 （例如房屋貸款） 貸款投資 （例如每月的節省方案）。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). `Rate`和`NPer`引數必須使用相同的單位表示一期付款期間計算。The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Rate`會使用幾個月，計算`NPer`必須也計算使用幾個月。For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months. 現金支出 （例如存款） 表示負數; 所有的引數，現金收入 （例如被除數檢查） 被以正數。For all arguments, cash paid (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`PPmt`計算相等值的所有付款時，在特定期間內的付款中有多少是主體的函式。This example uses the `PPmt` function to calculate how much of a payment for a specific period is principal when all the payments are of equal value. 是每一期百分比利率 (`APR / 12`)，為其所需的主體部分的付款期間 (`Period`)，付款的總數 (`TotPmts`)，現值或主體的貸款 (`PVal`)，貸款的未來值 (`FVal`)，並指出付款是否已到期的開頭或結尾的付款期間的數字 (`PayType`)。Given are the interest percentage rate per period (`APR / 12`), the payment period for which the principal portion is desired (`Period`), the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the present value or principal of the loan (`PVal`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), and a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`). span.span: Financial Summary

MemberSignature.Value: public static double PV (double Rate, double NPer, double Pmt, double FV = 0, Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod);
.method public static float64 PV(float64 Rate, float64 NPer, float64 Pmt, float64 FV, valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due) cil managed
Public Function PV (Rate As Double, NPer As Double, Pmt As Double, Optional FV As Double = 0, Optional Due As DueDate = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod) As Double
static member PV : double * double * double * double * Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate -> double

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 可指定每期利率。

span.span: specifies the interest rate per period.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽車貸款年利率 (APR) 為 10% 並採月付方式償還，則每期的利率為 0.1/12，也就是 0.0083。

span.span: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.

param.name: NPer
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定年金保險投資中付款的總期數。

span.span: specifies the total number of payment periods in the annuity.

param.span: 例如，如果您的四年期汽車貸款是採月付方式償還，則付款總期數就是 4 x 12 (即 48) 期。

span.span: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has 4 x 12 (or 48) payment periods.

param.name: Pmt
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 可指定每一期所要付的款項。

span.span: specifies the payment to be made each period.

param.span: 款項通常包含本金，以及不會隨著年金的有效期間而變更的利息。

span.span: Payments usually contain principal and interest that does not change during the life of the annuity.

param.name: FV
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 可指定您在最後一次付款之後想要的未來值或現金結存。

span.span: specifies the future value or cash balance you want after you make the final payment.

param.span: 例如，貸款的未來值為 $0，因為是代表最後一期付款之後的值。

span.span: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.

param.span: 然而，如果您想在 18 年內存下美金 $50,000 元做為子女教育費用，那麼美金 $50,000 元就是未來值。

span.span: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 類型的物件，指定付款何時到期。

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 這個引數必須是 DueDate.EndOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的結束日)，或 DueDate.BegOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的開始日)。

span.span: This argument must be either DueDate.EndOfPeriod if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or DueDate.BegOfPeriod if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 DueDate.EndOfPeriod。

span.span: If omitted, DueDate.EndOfPeriod is assumed.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定根據未來要支付的定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金現值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the present value of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments to be paid in the future and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定根據未來要支付的定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金現值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the present value of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments to be paid in the future and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 計算的年金是一系列固定的現金付款經過一段時間。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over a period of time. 計算的年金不一定 （例如房屋貸款） 貸款投資 （例如每月的節省方案）。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). `Rate`和`NPer`引數必須使用相同的單位表示一期付款期間計算。The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Rate`會使用幾個月，計算`NPer`必須也計算使用幾個月。For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months. 負數的數字; 對於所有的引數，表示現金支付方式 （例如存款）現金收入 （例如被除數檢查） 被以正數。For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 在此範例中，`PV`函式會傳回將提供一年，如接下來 20 年內的 50,000 美元的美金 $1,000,000 年金的現值。In this example, the `PV` function returns the present value of an $1,000,000 annuity that will provide $50,000 a year for the next 20 years. 提供的是預期的年度百分比率 (`APR`)，付款的總數 (`TotPmts`)，每個付款金額 (`YrIncome`)，未來的投資的總值 (`FVal`)，和數字，指出是否每個付款的開頭或結尾的付款期間 (`PayType`)。Provided are the expected annual percentage rate (`APR`), the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the amount of each payment (`YrIncome`), the total future value of the investment (`FVal`), and a number that indicates whether each payment is made at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`). 請注意，`YrIncome`是負數，因為它代表支付方式從年金每年的現金。Note that `YrIncome` is a negative number because it represents cash paid out from the annuity each year. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#25)]

span.span: Financial Summary

Public Function Rate (NPer As Double, Pmt As Double, PV As Double, Optional FV As Double = 0, Optional Due As DueDate = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod, Optional Guess As Double = 0.1) As Double

MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.VisualBasic.Financial.Rate (NPer, Pmt, PV, FV, Due, Guess)

param.name: NPer
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定年金保險投資中付款的總期數。

span.span: specifies the total number of payment periods in the annuity.

param.span: 例如，如果您的四年期汽車貸款是採月付方式償還，則付款總期數就是 4 \* 12 (即 48) 期。

span.span: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 \* 12 (or 48) payment periods.

param.name: Pmt
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 可指定每一期所要付的款項。

span.span: specifies the payment to be made each period.

param.span: 款項通常包含本金，以及不會隨著年金的有效期間而變更的利息。

span.span: Payments usually contain principal and interest that doesn't change over the life of the annuity.

param.name: PV
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 可指定一系列的未來付款或收到款項的現值或今天的價值。

span.span: specifies the present value, or value today, of a series of future payments or receipts.

param.span: 例如，當您貸款買車時，貸款金額就是您要以每月支付方式付給貸方的車款金額現值。

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

param.name: FV
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 可指定您在最後一次付款之後想要的未來值或現金結存。

span.span: specifies the future value or cash balance you want after you make the final payment.

param.span: 例如，貸款的未來值為 $0，因為是代表最後一期付款之後的值。

span.span: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.

param.span: 然而，如果您想在 18 年內存下美金 $50,000 元做為子女教育費用，那麼美金 $50,000 元就是未來值。

span.span: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 類型的物件，指定付款何時到期。

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 這個引數必須是 DueDate.EndOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的結束日)，或 DueDate.BegOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的開始日)。

span.span: This argument must be either DueDate.EndOfPeriod if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or DueDate.BegOfPeriod if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 DueDate.EndOfPeriod。

span.span: If omitted, DueDate.EndOfPeriod is assumed.

param.name: Guess
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: ，指定您預估的值會由 傳回。

span.span: specifying value you estimate is returned by .

param.span: 如果省略，則 會是 0.1 (百分之 10)。

span.span: If omitted, is 0.1 (10 percent).

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定年金在每一期的利率。

span.span: Returns a specifying the interest rate per period for an annuity.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定年金在每一期的利率。

span.span: Returns a specifying the interest rate per period for an annuity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 計算的年金是一系列固定的現金付款經過一段時間。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over a period of time. 計算的年金不一定 （例如房屋貸款） 貸款投資 （例如每月的節省方案）。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). 負數的數字; 對於所有的引數，表示現金支付方式 （例如存款）現金收入 （例如被除數檢查） 被以正數。For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. `Rate` 計算方式為反覆項目。`Rate` is calculated by iteration. 值的起始`Guess`，`Rate`循環的計算，直到 0.00001%為止。Starting with the value of `Guess`, `Rate` cycles through the calculation until the result is accurate to within 0.00001 percent. 如果`Rate`找不到 20 之後的結果會嘗試，它將會失敗。If `Rate` cannot find a result after 20 tries, it fails. 如果您的猜測是 10%並`Rate`失敗，嘗試不同的值給`Guess`。If your guess is 10 percent and `Rate` fails, try a different value for `Guess`. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Rate`函數來計算指定的總付款期數的貸款利率 (`TotPmts`)，loan 付款金額 (`Payment`)，現值或主體的貸款 (`PVal`)，未來貸款的值 (`FVal`)，表示是否付款已到期的開頭或結尾的付款期間的數字 (`PayType`)，和預期的利率的近似值 (`Guess`)。This example uses the `Rate` function to calculate the interest rate of a loan given the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the amount of the loan payment (`Payment`), the present value or principal of the loan (`PVal`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`), and an approximation of the expected interest rate (`Guess`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

span.span: Financial Summary

MemberSignature.Value: public static double SLN (double Cost, double Salvage, double Life);
.method public static float64 SLN(float64 Cost, float64 Salvage, float64 Life) cil managed
Public Function SLN (Cost As Double, Salvage As Double, Life As Double) As Double
public: static double SLN(double Cost, double Salvage, double Life);
static member SLN : double * double * double -> double

param.name: Cost
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產的初始成本。

span.span: specifying initial cost of the asset.

param.name: Salvage
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產在可用期末的價值。

span.span: specifying value of the asset at the end of its useful life.

param.name: Life
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產的可用期間長度。

span.span: specifying length of the useful life of the asset.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定資產在單一期間內的直線折舊。

span.span: Returns a specifying the straight-line depreciation of an asset for a single period.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定資產在單一期間內的直線折舊。

span.span: Returns a specifying the straight-line depreciation of an asset for a single period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 折舊期間必須為相同的單位來表示`Life`引數。The depreciation period must be expressed in the same unit as the `Life` argument. 所有引數必須是正數。All arguments must be positive numbers. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`SLN`函式傳回的直線折舊資產單期，指定資產的初始成本 (`InitCost`)，殘餘價值的資產使用年限的結尾 (`SalvageVal`)，和總生命週期年中的資產 (`LifeTime`)。This example uses the `SLN` function to return the straight-line depreciation of an asset for a single period given the asset's initial cost (`InitCost`), the salvage value at the end of the asset's useful life (`SalvageVal`), and the total life of the asset in years (`LifeTime`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

Public Function SYD (Cost As Double, Salvage As Double, Life As Double, Period As Double) As Double
public: static double SYD(double Cost, double Salvage, double Life, double Period);
static member SYD : double * double * double * double -> double

param.name: Cost
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產的初始成本。

span.span: specifying the initial cost of the asset.

param.name: Salvage
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產在可用期末的價值。

span.span: specifying the value of the asset at the end of its useful life.

param.name: Life
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產的可用期間長度。

span.span: specifying the length of the useful life of the asset.

param.name: Period
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定計算資產折舊所用的期間。

span.span: specifying the period for which asset depreciation is calculated.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定資產在指定之期間內的年數總和法折舊。

span.span: Returns a specifying the sum-of-years digits depreciation of an asset for a specified period.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定資產在指定之期間內的年數總和法折舊。

span.span: Returns a specifying the sum-of-years digits depreciation of an asset for a specified period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Life`和`Period`引數必須以相同的單位表示。The `Life` and `Period` arguments must be expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Life`有幾個月，`Period`也必須指定幾個月。For example, if `Life` is given in months, `Period` must also be given in months. 所有引數必須是正數。All arguments must be positive numbers. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`SYD`函數來傳回計算資產折舊資產的初始成本在指定期間內 (`InitCost`)，殘餘價值的資產使用年限的結尾 (`SalvageVal`)，和總計的生命週期中的資產年 (`LifeTime`)。This example uses the `SYD` function to return the depreciation of an asset for a specified period given the asset's initial cost (`InitCost`), the salvage value at the end of the asset's useful life (`SalvageVal`), and the total life of the asset in years (`LifeTime`).
